item.title: [Solaris] Importing HDA-Camera to LOP
item.description: Issue When importing your custom HDA camera into Solaris using SceneImportLOP, you can’t import it and it appear the waring. （Custom HDA camera is some thing like this.） The following warning appears. This may probably only appear in 19.5 or later. Solution Let’s go to the link that the waring said. We see the following statement at the beginning of the document. It seems that some work needs to be done to load the custom node into the LOP.
